!title: Cola Barbeque Sauce
!size: 1 Glas
!author: Andreas Wallner
!lang: de

* 300ml Cola
* 350ml Ketchup
* 150g Zwiebel, feinst geh.
* 125ml Apfelessig
* 1EL Chili, getr.
* 1TL Salz
* Worcestersauce
- aufkochen, 30—40 Minuten köcheln

!title: Bananen-Curry Sauce
!size: 1 Glas
!author: Andreas Wallner
!lang: de

* 150g Joghurt
* 100g Majonaise
* 1 Banane
* 2EL Currpulver
* 2EL Zitronensaft
* Salz

- Banane zerdrücken alles mischen

!title: Joghurt-Feta Dip
!size: 1 Glas
!author: Andreas Wallner
!lang: de

* 60g Feta
* 600g Joghurt
* 1EL Olivenöl

- mixen bis glatt

* 1 Zitroneschale
* 1Zweig Fenchelgrün
* Salz
* Pfeffer
* Zucker

- abschmecken
- über Nacht ziehen lassen

!title: Charred Pepper Sauce
!size: 1 Cup
!author: Andreas Wallner
!source: Smitten Kitchen (http://smittenkitchen.com/blog/2012/08/charred-pepper-steak-sauce/)
!lang: en

* 2 red bell peppers
- roast until blackened
- remove skin, seeds

* 2/3cup tomato purée
* 1/4cup orange juice
* 2Tbsp olive oil
* 1Tbsp balsamic vinegar
* 1Tbsp honey
* 1Tbsp ground mustard
* 1/2Tbsp ground ginger
* 1/4Tbsp ground black pepper
* 1/4Tbsp onion powder
* 1/8Tbsp ground allspice
* salt
* Worcestershire sauce
- add to peppers, purée
- simmer, reduce by half
- pass through sieve
